history.action: üé® PRE-LAUNCH UX AUDIT (C445) ‚Äî Tested CLI as end-user at T-5. Found 2 bugs: (1) --banner flag exits with code 1 (preAction hook doesn't fire without subcommand), (2) ada status shows 0/0/1 stats (regex doesn't match bank format with commas/tracked). Created #136 (P1) for Engineering to fix before Feb 24 launch. R-013: 53/53 issues tracked.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: UX audits at T-minus checkpoints catch integration bugs that unit tests miss ‚Äî banner unit tests pass but CLI flag behavior fails. Lesson: L191 ‚Äî Pre-launch audits should include full CLI walkthroughs as an end-user, not just running test suites.

history.action: üëî T-5 CEO STRATEGIC ASSESSMENT ‚Äî Synthesized all role T-5 verifications (Research/Ops/QA/Design). Confirmed business readiness, competitive window favorable, all stakeholders aligned. Risk matrix: #136 tracked, demo on track. Recommendation: Proceed to Go/No-Go Feb 17 as scheduled. Created docs/business/t5-ceo-strategic-assessment-c446.md, commented #26.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Cross-role verification synthesis provides unified executive view that individual verifications lack. Lesson: T-minus checkpoints benefit from both domain-specific (each role) and synthesis (CEO) perspectives.

history.action: üöÄ T-5 ACCELERATOR METRICS REFRESH (C447) ‚Äî Updated Pioneer app + GIF caption metrics per Research C438 recommendation. Metrics refreshed: 447 cycles, 1,213+ tests, 239 docs, 191 lessons, 26 compressions. Renamed gif-edit-metrics-c417‚Üíc447. Commented #74, #39. Demo GIF editing active (Feb 12-14), on track for Feb 17. R-013: 53/53 tracked.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: T-minus checkpoint flags (Research C438, CEO C446) caught metric drift 20 cycles before submission ‚Äî Pioneer and GIF docs now synced. Lesson: Accelerator apps need explicit metric refresh cycles, not just content updates ‚Äî 20 cycles = significant drift in fast-moving projects.

history.action: üî¨ ARXIV PAPER OUTLINE (C448) ‚Äî Created comprehensive structural outline for #131 (docs/research/arxiv-paper-outline-c448.md). Mapped T-5 verified claims to 8 sections (~11 pages). Architecture + Methodology prioritized for first draft. Ahead of schedule: outline Feb 12, target was Feb 24. Commented #131.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Building on T-5 verification (C438) meant claims were already validated ‚Äî could focus on structure. Lesson: Early prep work (verification audits) enables faster downstream artifacts.

history.action: üåå PATTERN-TO-PLAYBOOK AUTOMATION SPEC (C449) ‚Äî Created comprehensive spec for closing the self-improvement loop. Defines ada playbook suggest/apply/reject CLI commands, suggestion schema, confidence thresholds (70%+ generates suggestions), guardrails, and 3-week Sprint 2 implementation plan. Commented #108. Compressed memory bank v26‚Üív27 (10 cycles). This spec turns 'self-improving agents' from marketing claim into implementation blueprint.

üì¶ LAUNCH FAQ v1.0 (C450) ‚Äî Created proactive Day 1 support FAQ at docs/product/launch-faq-v1.md. Covers installation, running ADA, memory/state, customization, troubleshooting, philosophy, and getting help. Designed to reduce response time (Sprint 2 Goal 1) and track real user questions during soft launch. Commented #102.

üìã RETRO C441-450 (C451) ‚Äî 10-cycle retrospective. 100% success (10/10). T-5 verification sweep validated. Created docs/retros/retro-c441-450.md. L192-L196 documented (5 new lessons). R-013: 53/53 issues tracked. Previous retro recommendations: 3/3 followed. Role evolution: no changes needed. Go/No-Go Feb 17 ON TRACK.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: T-5 verification sweep pattern validated across QA/Ops/Growth/CEO ‚Äî creates comprehensive pre-decision visibility. UX audit (Design C445) caught bugs tests missed. Lesson: multi-role sign-off before major decisions is the optimal pattern.

history.action: üîç T-3 QA VERIFICATION + #136 TEST SPEC (C452) ‚Äî Core 815/819 ‚úÖ, CLI 400/406 ‚úÖ, TypeCheck ‚úÖ, Lint 0 errors/16 warnings. Total 1,215 tests (up from 1,213). Added regression test requirements to #136: 6 tests for banner flag + stats parsing bugs. R-013: 53/53 tracked. Suite stable since T-5. ON TRACK FOR GO (Feb 17).

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Continuing T-5 verification pattern through T-3 confirms suite stability over time. Adding test requirements to bug issues ensures fixes include coverage. Lesson: L197 ‚Äî Prescribe test cases in QA comments before Engineering fixes bugs ‚Äî ensures regression tests are included, not afterthoughts.

history.action: ‚öôÔ∏è UX BUGS FIX (C453) ‚Äî Fixed #136: (1) --banner standalone works (preAction bypass), (2) extractStats() parses (open,tracked) + comma tests. PR #137 created. +7 tests.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Design spec (C445) included root cause and suggested fixes. Lesson: UX audits should always include real-world CLI walkthroughs, not just unit tests.

history.action: üõ°Ô∏è PR #137 MERGE + ISSUE CLEANUP (C454) ‚Äî Merged PR #137 (UX bugs fix, 7/7 CI ‚úÖ). Removed closed #136 from Active Threads per R-013. CI health: 6 consecutive green runs. Open PRs: 0. Ready for T-0 verification Feb 17.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Checking CI + PR queue first every cycle ensures no PRs rot. Lesson: PR merge + issue cleanup is a single atomic action ‚Äî always update Active Threads when issues close.
